column1: in memory of louie jacob mc. allister jr. -- west cobb funeral home and crematory| louie jacob mc. allister jr. march 25
column5: 2015 send card biography. louie jacob mc. allister
column11: 2015. funeral services will be held at 3pm on tuesday
column13: 2015 at mighty fortress evangelical lutheran church with pastor paul horn officiating. he will lie in state 1 hour prior to the service at the church. born in atlanta
column14: mr. mc. allister lived in marietta for the past 42 years. a graduate of southern tech
column15: he worked for delta for 10 years
column16: then was employed with the cobb county school system for 28 years before retiring. he was a talented musician
column18: and loved marching bands and playing golf. he was preceded in death by his wife
column21: joshua gilliland. survivors include:3 children: karen (david) gilliland
column27: ga2 granddaughters: katie gilliland and talia mc. allisterin lieu of flowers
column28: donations may be made to the mighty fortress evangelical lutheran church building fund. the family will receive friends monday
column29: june 22nd from 5pm to 8pm at west cobb funeral home and crematory in marietta. online guest book @ www. westcobbfuneralhome. com.
